docs.lead_paragraph: An audacious conservative, Rep. Michele Bachmann stood out from the moment she was first elected to Congress in 2006. Democrats were ascendant and Bachmann was a stridently Republican new arrival with a homespun Minnesota twang.

docs.lead_paragraph: Chris Hughes, a Facebook founder, purchased The New Republic magazine in 2012 praising its journalistic history, but recent decisions there have led to a walkout by several staff members.

byline.original: By JONATHAN MAHLER and RAVI SOMAIYA

docs.snippet: Chris Hughes, a Facebook founder, purchased The New Republic magazine in 2012 praising its journalistic history, but recent decisions there have led to a walkout by several staff members....
docs.abstract: Recent changes at The New Republic by owner Chris Hughes, a Facebook founder, have led to some staff resignations, including that of editor Franklin Foer, and forced magazine to cancel its next issue; Hughes defends his stewardship of magazine, which included setting aggressive targets for web traffic and proposals to turn magazine into technology company.

headline.print_headline: Revolt at the New New Republic
headline.main: Revolt at the New New Republic

docs.lead_paragraph: President Obama, once determined to change a political system “that’s divided us for too long,” has adopted an unconciliatory strategy for achieving his goals.
docs.snippet: President Obama, once determined to change a political system “that’s divided us for too long,” has adopted an unconciliatory strategy for achieving his goals....
docs.abstract: Political Memo; Pres Obama's immigration action made clear his determination to direct his focus on his governing objectives, despite bludgeoning Democratic Party suffered in midterms; Obama has appeared to conclude that pursuing bipartisan reconciliation in his final two years in office is a fool's chase and has turned instead on advancing the policy goals he embraced as a candidate.

docs.lead_paragraph: After weeks of planning and jitters about protocol, the city welcomed Prince William and his wife, Catherine, for a three-day visit.

docs.abstract: Great Britain's Prince William and Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge, arrive in New York City for a three-day visit; scores of people gather outside the Carlyle Hotel on Madison Avenue to catch a glimpse of the royal couple, some traveling from as far as Wisconsin or North Carolina.
